Race.SpecificTitle: Constable -- Justice of the Peace Ward 4
Chief of Police -- Town of Elton
Chief of Police -- Town of Lake Arthur
Council Members -- Town of Lake Arthur
PW Maintenance Millage Renewal -- 2.61 Mills - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Jefferson Davis, State of Louisiana, be authorized to continue to levy a tax of two and sixty-one hundredths (2.61) mills on all property subject to taxation within the Parish, for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2015 and ending with the year 2024, with collections from the levy of the tax estimated to be $503,914.50 for one entire year, for upkeep and maintenance of the Parish courthouse and Parish Jail?

Race.SpecificTitle: Sub Rd. Dist. 1 of Rd. Dist. 11 -- 10.32 Mills - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Sub Road District No. 1 of Road District Number Eleven Proposition
(Maintenance Millage Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall Sub Road District No. 1 of Road District Number Eleven of the Parish of Jefferson Davis, Louisiana, be authorized to continue to levy a tax of ten and thirty-two hundredths (10.32) mills on all property subject to taxation within the District, for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2015 and ending with the year 2024, with collections from the levy of the tax estimated to be $224,389.04 for one entire year, for the purpose of improving and maintaining Parish roads and bridges within the District, title to which shall be in the public?

Race.SpecificTitle: Fire Protection District No. 6 -- 5.53 Mills - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Fire Protection District No. 6 Proposition
(Millage Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall Fire Protection District No. 6 of the Parish of Jefferson Davis, State of Louisiana, be authorized to continue to levy a special tax of five and fifty-three hundredths (5.53) mills on all property subject to taxation within the District, for a period of ten (10) years beginning with the year 2015 and ending with the year 2024, with collections from the levy of the tax estimated to be $55,115.35 for one entire year, for the purpose of fire protection, including constructing, improving, maintaining and operating fire protection facilities, title to which shall be in the public?
